title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4113 - Steward's List And Unqualified Horses

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 4113

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128, 227, 301, 902; L. 1940, ch. 254, § 36, as amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
